text: @trishgreenhalgh And at her almost daily national updates she spoke first to families who had lost loved ones to Covid19 so front and centre was always the reason for the lockdown,to stop more https://t.co/bGrmQPFupI’s been very hard for families and our businesses but @jacindaardern has lead💛🇳🇿
